name: Simplistic Solar System Simulator
description:
More of a proof of concept than a game, Simplistic Solar System Simulator allows you to throw stars and planets around while staying true to real-life physics.

I plan to base an actual game on it at some point in the future, but figured it might be fun to just build your own solar system so I upload it as it is.

Controls:

  • W/S - initial velocity
  • A/D - angle
  • Enter + number keys + comma - input mass
  • Arrows - move camera
  • Page Up/Page Down - zoom camera
  • Home - reset camera
  • Space - pause
  • Escape - reset field
